PayTm Logo Test

This is the base64-encoded PayTm logo that should appear in the checkout page:

What should be checked:

  1. The PayTm logo above should be visible as a blue square with the PayTm logo inside.
  2. If you can see the logo above but not in the checkout page, it might be a JavaScript issue with how the payment method is selected.
  3. To test in the checkout page:
    • Go to the checkout page
    • Click on the PayTm payment method
    • The same logo should appear beneath the payment method selection
